itemDescription: English-Welsh rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main:
Anthony John "Tony" Gray (born 14 June 1942 in Stoke-on-Trent), is a former Wales international rugby union player and former Head Coach of the Wales national rugby union team. A flanker, he played his club rugby for Newbridge and London Welsh.
As a coach he took the Welsh team to third place in the inaugural Rugby World Cup, a feat not yet equalled.
